item.title: Serving a machine learning model via API
item.description: About the Plumer package In oder to serve our API we will make use of the great Plumer package in R To read more about this package go to: https://www.rplumber.io/docs/ Setup Load in some packages. If you are going to host the api on a suse or redhat linux server make sure you have all the dependencies as well as the packages installed to follow through this example yourself.
